contents:
/-!
# Testing LeanInk
-/

/-- A proof of the commutativity of addition of natural numbers. -/
theorem xyz : ∀ m n : Nat, m + n = n + m :=

goals: ⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

m : Nat
⊢ ∀ (n : Nat), m + n = n + m
⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + n = n + m
⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + n = n + m
⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + n = n + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + (n + 0) = n + 0 + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + (n + 0) = n + 0 + m
⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

m n : Nat
⊢ m + n = n + m
⊢ ∀ (m n : Nat), m + n = n + m

contents:
-- A text comment
#check xyz -- xyz (m n : Nat) : m + n = n + m
